headline: Why The Narrative Around Aptiv (APTV) Is Shifting With New Targets And Diversified Growth
summary: Why Aptiv’s Fair Value Estimate Just Shifted Aptiv’s fair value estimate has been nudged higher from about US$99.65 to about US$100.81 as analysts update their models to reflect refreshed growth targets and a broader business mix that now spans Physical AI, aerospace, commercial vehicles and auto technology. The discount rate has been trimmed modestly from about 8.95% to about 8.78%, while revenue growth expectations in the model have been adjusted slightly lower from about 5.20% to about...

headline: Why Aptiv (APTV) Is Up 13.0% After Landing Its First Indian Commercial-ADAS Platform Deal
summary: Aptiv PLC recently announced that a leading Indian commercial vehicle OEM has chosen its Gen 6 ADAS platform to equip future trucks and buses across 14 models and more than 30 variants, ahead of 2027 safety regulations in India. This first ADAS collaboration with an Indian commercial vehicle manufacturer, powered by Aptiv’s Gen 8 radar, Gen 7 smart camera, and LINC software platform, highlights how its AI-driven, modular safety systems can address complex use cases in emerging markets. We’ll...
